text: fa'aqim -ayha alrasul 'ant waman atbek- wjhk, wastmr ealaa aldiyn aldhy shreh allah lk, wahu al'islam aldhy fatar allah alnaas elyh, fbqawkm elyh, wtmskkm bh, tamasuk bftrt allah min al'iiman biallah whdh, la tabdil likhalq allah wdynh, fahu altariq almustaqim almawsil 'iilaa rida allah rabu alealamin wjnth, wlkn 'akthar alnaas la yaelamun 'ana aldhy 'amartuk bih -ayha alrswl- hu aldiyn alhaqu dun swah
